channel.title: CVE Feed for Blocksera -- Image Hover Effects – Elementor Addon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Blocksera -- Image Hover Effects – Elementor Addon

item.title: CVE-2024-29936|2024-03-27T10:19:48.362Z -- blocksera -- image%20hover%20effects%20%E2%80%93%20elementor%20addon
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Blocksera Image Hover Effects – Elementor Addon allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Image Hover Effects – Elementor Addon: from n/a through 1.4.
